title: Create a Project Marketing Website
description: A developer needs a website for a new housing community to capture leads and provide information.

tasks.description: Use a website template to create a new project website.
tasks.expected_outcome: A basic website structure is created.

tasks.description: Add content to the website, including project renderings, floor plans, pricing, and a community map.
tasks.expected_outcome: The website is populated with all relevant project information.

tasks.description: Create a lead capture form on the website that integrates with the sales team's CRM.
tasks.expected_outcome: A functional lead form is created that automatically sends new leads to the CRM.
